title: Shop Linker - eCommerce Application Built with MERN Stack
description: Developed Shop Linker, a feature-rich eCommerce application designed to provide a seamless shopping experience from browsing to checkout. Built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), this application showcases my ability to create a robust, scalable, and interactive online shopping platform.

title: Real-Time Chat Application with MERN Stack
description: Developed a robust real-time chat application utilizing the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) to deliver a seamless and interactive user experience. This project integrates WebSocket technology for instant messaging and dynamic updates, allowing users to engage in real-time conversations with minimal latency.

title: Figma Clone
description: A Figma clone is a design tool that replicates the core features and functionality of Figma, allowing users to create and collaborate on user interface designs. It typically offers vector graphics editing, prototyping, and real-time collaboration, aiming to provide a similar user experience to Figma.
